name: iqline-design-system
description: Canonical layout system components for Vite + React + shadcn applications

items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content

items.name: alert-dialog
items.title: Alert Dialog
items.description: A modal dialog that interrupts the user with important content and expects a response

items.name: alert
items.title: Alert
items.description: Displays a callout for user attention

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Displays content within a desired ratio

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links

items.name: button-group
items.title: Button Group
items.description: Groups buttons together

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button

items.name: calendar
items.title: Calendar
items.description: A date field component that allows users to enter and edit date

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer

items.name: carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: A carousel with motion and swipe built using Embla

items.name: chart
items.title: Chart
items.description: Recharts wrapper for building charts

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel

items.name: combobox
items.title: Combobox
items.description: Autocomplete input and command palette with a list of suggestions

items.name: command
items.title: Command
items.description: Fast, composable, unstyled command menu for React

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — such as a set of actions or functions — triggered by a button

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window

items.name: drawer
items.title: Drawer
items.description: A drawer component for mobile

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user — such as a set of actions or functions — triggered by a button

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty
items.description: An empty state component

items.name: field
items.title: Field
items.description: A form field component

items.name: hover-card
items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link

items.name: input-group
items.title: Input Group
items.description: Groups inputs together

items.name: input-otp
items.title: Input OTP
items.description: Accessible one-time password component with copy paste functionality

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field

items.name: item
items.title: Item
items.description: A generic item component

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Displays keyboard keys or a combination of keys

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls

items.name: menubar
items.title: Menubar
items.description: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications

items.name: native-select
items.title: Native Select
items.description: Displays a native HTML select component

items.name: navigation-menu
items.title: Navigation Menu
items.description: A collection of links for navigating websites

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination with page navigation

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons—known as radio buttons—where no more than one of the buttons can be checked at a time

items.name: resizable
items.title: Resizable
items.description: Accessible resizable panel groups and layouts with keyboard support

items.name: scroll-area
items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Augments native scroll functionality for custom, cross-browser styling

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from—triggered by a button

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: Extends the Dialog component to display content that complements the main content of the screen

items.name: sidebar
items.title: Sidebar
items.description: A sidebar component with collapsible support

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Use to show a placeholder while content is loading

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range

items.name: sonner
items.title: Sonner
items.description: An opinionated toast component for React

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: A loading spinner component

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: Powerful table and datagrid built with TanStack Table

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content—known as tab panels—that are displayed one at a time

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element when the element receives keyboard focus or the mouse hovers over it

items.name: global-header
items.title: Global Header
items.description: Application-wide header with breadcrumbs, user menu, and notifications

items.name: global-sidebar
items.title: Global Sidebar
items.description: Application-wide left navigation sidebar with collapsible support

items.name: global-footer
items.title: Global Footer
items.description: Optional application-wide footer component

items.name: page-header
items.title: Page Header
items.description: Page-level header with title, leading elements, and actions. Features sticky positioning and scroll detection.

items.name: page-tabs
items.title: Page Tabs
items.description: Tabs component for page-level navigation with controlled state support

items.name: back-button
items.title: Back Button
items.description: Navigation back button supporting href, onClick, or browser history

items.name: login-form
items.title: Login Form
items.description: Reusable login form component with email/password fields, forgot password link, and signup link

items.name: password-reset-form
items.title: Password Reset Form
items.description: Reusable password reset form component with email input and back to login link

items.name: data-table
items.title: Data Table
items.description: Comprehensive data table component with search, filters, pagination, column visibility, and row selection

items.name: metric-card
items.title: Metric Card
items.description: Reusable metric card component for displaying key performance indicators with trend indicators and optional descriptions

items.name: app-shell
items.title: App Shell
items.description: Main application shell with sidebar, header, footer, and outlet for routes

items.name: page-shell
items.title: Page Shell
items.description: Base page container providing consistent spacing and vertical flow

items.name: split-layout
items.title: Split Layout
items.description: Configurable split pane layout (defaults to 70/30, customizable)

items.name: nested-shell
items.title: Nested Shell
items.description: Second-level sidebar layout with scrollable sidebar, optional header/footer, and configurable sidebar width

items.name: page-with-properties
items.title: Page With Properties
items.description: Layout with main content and right-side properties panel

items.name: page-header-with-tabs
items.title: Page Header With Tabs
items.description: Composition pattern combining page header and tabs

items.name: page-header-with-back
items.title: Page Header With Back
items.description: Composition pattern combining page header with back button

items.name: not-found-page
items.title: Not Found Page
items.description: Reusable 404 error page template with customizable navigation options and SVG illustration
